common_filenames.description: [VM name].nvram - The name of the NVRAM file is the same name as the VM. For example, the NVRAM file for a "Fedora 36" VM is Fedora 36.nvram .
[VM name].nvram - The name of the NVRAM file is the same name as the VM. For example, the NVRAM file for a "Fedora 36" VM is Fedora 36.nvram .
